original_text: They will attack you with their weapons, their chariots and with a large army of soldiers. They will come together all around you, on every side. They will have different kinds of shields. They will wear helmets on their heads. I will give them authority to judge you. They will punish you in the way that they choose.
korean_text: 그들이 무기와 병거와 수레와 크고 작은 방패를 이끌고 투구 쓴 군대를 거느리고 치러 와서 너를 에워싸리라 내가 재판을 그들에게 맡긴즉 그들이 그들의 법대로 너를 재판하리라

sentences.original_text: They will attack you with their weapons
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그들의 무기로 당신을 공격할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and with a large army of soldiers
They will come together all around you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 당신 주변 모든 곳에 모일 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will have different kinds of shields
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여러 종류의 방패들을 가질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will wear helmets on their heads
I will give them authority to judge you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들에게 당신을 재판할 권위를 주겠습니다

sentences.original_text: in the way that they choose
